title: Apfelk√ºcherl

title: Asparagus Risotto

title: Avocado Salad
ingredients: 2 cups shredded chicken, 1 avocado, 1 1/2 tbsp lime juice, 2 tbsp Greek yogurt, 1/2 cup cheddar, 1/2 tsp garlic powder, Salt to taste,

title: Bacon Zucchini Risotto
ingredients: 1 tbsp olive oil, 1 onion, finely diced, 3 cloves garlic, minvced, 4 slices thick-cut bacon (or 6 slices regular bacon), diced, 1 cup arborio rice, 32 oz chicken stock, heated, 2 large zucchini, grated, 1/2 cup parmesan cheese, shredded, 1 tbsp butter,

title: Baked Sausage and Cheese Rigatoni
ingredients: 1 lb ground Italian sausage (preferably sweet), 1 tbsp fennel seeds, 12 oz roasted red bell peppers, 25 oz marinara sauce, 16 oz rigatoni pasta, 15 oz ricotta cheese, 8 oz parmesan cheese, grated, 1/4 cup parslet, chopped, 6-8 slices provole cheese,

title: Balsamic Glazed Salmon
ingredients: 4 salmon filets (in the original recipe... but we like to double the glaze and use only 2 or 3 fillets...), 1/4 cup balsamic vinegar, 1/4 cup water, 1 1/2 tbsp lemon juice, 1 tbsp and 1 tsp brown sugar (packed),

title: Banana Bread
ingredients: 4 bananas, 1/2 cup butter, 1/2 cup sugar, 2 eggs, 2 cups flour, 1/2 tsp baking soda, 1 tsp baking powder, pinch salt, 1/4 cup nuts (we like pecans),

title: Basic Quiche
ingredients: 1 unbaked flaky pie crust or all butter pie crust, 4 large eggs, 1/2 cup whole milk, 1/2 cup heavy cream or heavy whipping cream, 1/4 tsp salt, 1/4 tsp pepper, Up to 1 cup shredded or crumbled cheese (variety is up to you), Up to 2 cups of add-ins, like vegetables,

title: Bread Machine Bread Sticks

title: Broccoli Beer Cheese Soup

title: Cauliflower Cacciatore
ingredients: 1 head of cauliflower, 1lb mini sweet peppers, 1 yellow onion, diced, 5oz mild goat cheese (we like Chavrie brand), 5oz sour cream, jar of cacciatore sauce (we like Cookwell & Company), 1 cup red wine, croutons (we make our own), fresh cilantro,

title: Cheesecake Cookies

title: Cheesy Garlic Bread
